description:
The secret to happiness on tough hikes is tough socks. These have high-density cushioning underfoot to help your feet go the distance.

  • High-density knit merino wool with nylon and spandex for moisture wicking durability and warmth
  • Seamless construction for chafe-free comfort
  • Cushioning underfoot for all day comfort in hiking boots
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Hiker Cushion Quarter Socks - Unisex
